### import raw TR data 

```{r wd librairies}

library(ggplot2)
library(car)
library(ggpubr)
library(segmented)
library(pastecs)
library(dplyr)
library(patchwork)
library(RLRsim)
library(lme4)
library(inti)

here::here()

opPATH.obj= "./saved_objects/"
  if (!dir.exists(opPATH.obj)) dir.create(opPATH.obj, recursive = TRUE)


opPATH.results= "./results/"
  if (!dir.exists(opPATH.results)) dir.create(opPATH.results, recursive = TRUE)


opPATH.data= "./data/"
  if (!dir.exists(opPATH.data)) dir.create(opPATH.data, recursive = TRUE)


opPATH.fig= "./figures/"
  if (!dir.exists(opPATH.fig)) dir.create(opPATH.fig, recursive = TRUE)
```

```{r import data }
data <- read.csv(here::here(opPATH.data, "DATA_ROOT_TRAITS_LTP_2025.csv"), dec = ".", sep = ";")
data$PHENOTYPED = as.factor(data$PHENOTYPED)
# select only 4 rep , ie Phenotyped during week 1 or 2, but not both 1&2
data = data %>% filter(PHENOTYPED %in% c("1", "2"))
unique(data$PHENOTYPED)


data$N_GENO=as.factor(data$N_GENO)
data$REPETITION=as.factor(data$REPETITION) 
data$BLOCK=as.factor(data$BLOCK)
data$BLOCK_WEEK=as.factor(data$BLOCK_WEEK) 
data$WEEK=as.factor(data$WEEK)


data$LEAF_AREA=as.numeric(data$LEAF_AREA)
data$ROOT_SHOOT=as.numeric(data$ROOT_SHOOT)


nlevels(data$N_GENO)
nlevels(data$REPETITION)
nlevels(data$BLOCK)


save_before_cleaning_4_rep = data
ROOT_ = data

data=na.omit(data)


trial="LTP_PM_2025"
trait_name = "ROOT_SHOOT"

```

```{r histogram }

#Clean  data (remove NAs)
ROOT_SHOOT_values <- na.omit(data$ROOT_SHOOT)
df <- data.frame(ROOT_SHOOT = ROOT_SHOOT_values)
mean_ROOT_SHOOT <- mean(ROOT_SHOOT_values)
sd_ROOT_SHOOT <- sd(ROOT_SHOOT_values)

#Create histogram with normal curve using ggplot2
p <- ggplot(df, aes(x = ROOT_SHOOT)) +
  geom_histogram(aes(y = ..density..), bins = 30, fill = "lightblue", color = "black") +
  stat_function(fun = dnorm, args = list(mean = mean_ROOT_SHOOT, sd = sd_ROOT_SHOOT), color = "darkred", size = 1.2) +
  labs(
    title =  paste("Histogram of", trait_name, trial ),
    x = trait_name,
    y = "Density"
  ) +
  theme_minimal()

print(p)
```

```{r anova among block rep}
model<-lm(ROOT_SHOOT~REPETITION, data = data)
aov<-Anova(model)
print(aov)


model<-lm(ROOT_SHOOT~BLOCK, data = data)
aov<-Anova(model)
print(aov)

model<-lm(ROOT_SHOOT~BLOCK_WEEK, data = data)
aov<-aov(model)
print(aov)


model<-lm(ROOT_SHOOT~WEEK, data = data)
aov<-Anova(model)
print(aov)
```

```{r anova geno }
library(lme4)
#### week only source of variation here (no variation due to repetition,  block, )
model_geno<- lmer( ROOT_SHOOT ~ 1 + (1 | N_GENO) + (1 | WEEK) , data = data)
print(model_geno)
```


```{r anova without }
model_reduced <- lmer( ROOT_SHOOT ~ 1 + (1 | WEEK),  data = data)
print(model_reduced)

```


```{r comparison }
anova(model_reduced, model_geno)

```

```{r heritability }
library("inti")
library(lme4)

hr <- H2cal(data = data,
            trait = "ROOT_SHOOT",
            gen.name = "N_GENO",
            rep.n = 4,
            fixed.model = "0 + N_GENO + (1 | WEEK)",
            random.model = " 1 + (1 | N_GENO) +  (1 | WEEK) ",
            emmeans = TRUE,
            plot_diag = TRUE,
            outliers.rm = TRUE)


last_plot <- recordPlot()

df_output = as.data.frame(t(hr$tabsmr))

knitr::kable(df_output, caption = paste0("Summary heritability estimates ", trait_name, " ", trial))
 
```






```{r heritability output}

# Save as image (PNG or PDF)
png(filename = here::here(paste0(opPATH.fig, "HERITABILITY_", trait_name, "_", trial, ".png")),
    width = 6, height = 4, units = "in", res = 300)
replayPlot(last_plot)
dev.off()
```


# blups :

```{r blups}

blup_result = as.data.frame(hr$blups)

blup_result <- blup_result %>%
  left_join(data[, c("N_GENO", "GENO_NAME")], by = "N_GENO")

blup_result <- unique(blup_result)
nrow(blup_result)
save(blup_result, file =  paste0(opPATH.obj,"BLUPS_",trait_name, "_", trial, ".RData"))  
write.table(blup_result, file = paste0(opPATH.results,"BLUPS_",trait_name, "_", trial, ".csv"), dec = ".", sep = ";")
```

```{r mean per geno}
ROOT_SHOOT_mean<-as.data.frame(with(data, tapply(data$ROOT_SHOOT, N_GENO, mean)))
ROOT_SHOOT_mean = cbind(rownames(ROOT_SHOOT_mean),  ROOT_SHOOT_mean$`with(data, tapply(data$ROOT_SHOOT, N_GENO, mean))`)
colnames(ROOT_SHOOT_mean) = c("N_GENO", "ROOT_AREA")
ROOT_SHOOT_mean<-as.data.frame(ROOT_SHOOT_mean)
ROOT_SHOOT_mean$ROOT_AREA = as.numeric(ROOT_SHOOT_mean$ROOT_AREA)
ROOT_SHOOT_mean$N_GENO = as.factor(ROOT_SHOOT_mean$N_GENO)



metadata_geno <- save_before_cleaning_4_rep[!duplicated(save_before_cleaning_4_rep$N_GENO), ]
ROOT_SHOOT_mean <- merge(ROOT_SHOOT_mean, metadata_geno, by = "N_GENO", all.x = TRUE)

ROOT_SHOOT_mean <- ROOT_SHOOT_mean %>% select(N_GENO, ROOT_SHOOT, GENO_NAME)

write.table(ROOT_SHOOT_mean, file = paste0(opPATH.results,trait_name, "_mean_", trial, ".csv"), dec = ".", sep = ";")

```
